candidates.title: Dx12 initial commit
candidates.body:
Vulkan/Metal still work with basic/advanced pipelines
DX12 is generally working at the API level but is not ready to use with higher level code yet, but is generally working
The current GLSL->HLSL path basically works but has downsides I'd like to address in the future

candidates.title: Add SwapchainDef as a parameter to SwapchainHandler::create_swapchain
candidates.body: Disable HDR color space in demo, it causes an unwanted monitor flicker on some platforms when transitioning between color spaces

candidates.title: Add meshopt support for preprocessing index/vertex buffers
Clustered forward lighting
candidates.body:
* First-pass implementation of forward clustered lighting (clustering via compute shader) in the modern pipeline
 * Make shadow-casting optional on a per-light basis
 * Add a frame index to swapchain handler and views
 * Simplify API to add external images/buffers to the render graph
 * Enable shader optimizations by default

candidates.title: Start forking the basic pipeline to create a modern pipeline
Reorganize GLSL files
candidates.body: Reorganize GLSL files in subdirectories, regenerate shaders/rust code and other cleanup

candidates.title: Compute-shader based autoexposure and HDR
candidates.body:
- Support for HDR/swapchain color spaces
 - Improved tonemapping
 - Compute shader-based autoexposure
 - Additional improvements to the render graph to support compute shaders

candidates.title: Update egui/puffin to match latest profiling release, default to 1600x900 window size
PBR and bloom fixes
candidates.body: Fix a number of issues that made exported scenes look different from blender eevee renders. Mainly fixes to normal mapping and reading data from the wrong texture channel. This also adds support for configuring images to be imported as linear or non-linear sRGB (and compression options.) This is essential for normal mapping to work correctly.

repo.name: rafx
repo.description: Multi-backend renderer with asset pipeline. The objective of this repo is to build a scalable, flexible, data driven renderer.
